definition:
A [*silver rectangle*]{} is a rectangle with either the silver ratio for
its width-to-length ratio or the ratio $1 : \sqrt{2}$. Like the golden
rectangle, both silver rectangles have the property that if we remove
from them a square, their ratio remains the same.

(-1,-1)(15.142135623730950488,11) (0,0)(14.142135623730950488,10)
(10,0)(10,10)
